content: Adds KeyCode properties PrimaryModifier and SecondaryModifier on InputBindings to trigger an action only when the modifier keys are presesd.
Updates the phrasing on Luau's type mismatch errors to be both clearer, and more succinct.

In Luau type functions, the `unionof` and `intersectionof` functions will now flatten nested instances of their respective types. For example, `types.unionof(types.unionof(types.number, types.string), types.boolean)` will produce `number | string | boolean` as a single resultant union type.
Adds autocomplete support for the built-in `@game` require alias.
Adds new `game.RunService` property so that developers no longer have to type out `game["Run Service"]` or `game:GetService("RunService")`.
When printed as a value in a Luau table, the `SecurityCapabilities` enum now displays the represented security state as a string instead of a numeric value.
Fixes a bug where passing too many arguments to certain functions would not be properly flagged as a Script Analysis warning.

Adds the following properties to the Sky object: `Class.Sky.MoonTextureContent|MoonTextureContent`, `Class.Sky.SkyboxBackContent|SkyboxBackContent`, `Class.Sky.SkyboxDownContent|SkyboxDownContent`, `Class.Sky.SkyboxFrontContent|SkyboxFrontContent`, `Class.Sky.SkyboxLeftContent|SkyboxLeftContent`, `Class.Sky.SkyboxRightContent|SkyboxRightContent`, `Class.Sky.SkyboxUpContent|SkyboxUpContent`, and `Class.Sky.SunTextureContent|SunTextureContent`.
Luau's New Type Solver: Indexing into the result of the `setmetatable` type function is less likely to infer to `any`
Luau's New Type Solver: Fixes some instances of "Type inference failed to complete" when trying to infer the types of globals captured by multiple functions.
Luau's New Type Solver: Adjusts generic instantiation to never select `never` or `unknown`, ensuring user always gets a useful type.
Luau's New Type Solver: Functions that accept nilable functions now have said types "pushed" into function literals.
Luau's New Type Solver: function statements that are assigning a member to a predefined table type are now checked.
Adds HashChecks line to debug Network - LR Metrics.
In Roblox Studio's Script Analysis Widget, errors within a module now sort numerically rather than lexically. For example, an error on line 67 will now be listed before an error on line 127.
Updates the save place dialog when closing a place with a new look, making it feel fresh and more modern!
Luau's New Type Solver: Fixes a bug where explicit type annotations on `for ... in` loop variables were not being respected.
Mouse cursor no longer changes to a pointing hand icon when clicking on inactive `GuiButton`.
Fixes a bug in Luau's type system where type functions that returned types with generic type packs would sometimes cause Roblox Studio to crash.
Fixes an issue where changing `Class.AudioFilter.FilterType` to `Lowpass6dB` while the filter is in-use caused it to become unstable.
Ensure microprofiler displays memory categories when memory tracking is enabled.
Server Authority Studio Beta: immediate descendants of Workspace now will be properly automatically predicted.
Fixed Explorer firing SelectionChanged more often than necessary

Having an invalid Default Instances Dir will no longer cause Studio to crash on start under the User Provided Default Instances beta feature. This could happen if you had chosen a network drive which later became unavailable.
Fixes an issue where malicious actors could use badly formed active:// animation ids to print malicious strings in the console of connected players.
Fixes animation bug where animations weren't loaded on some clients on late join in some context when streaming was on.
Executing remote events that are not attached to the DataModel will now not have an error message
Meshes with corrupted collision data can no longer have arbitrarily large `ExtentsSize`. `ExtentsSize` is now clamped to 2048 studs in all directions.
